name: Creates a Google Meet appointment from a Google sheet spreadsheet.
description: Make checks in specified intervals whether there is a new row in a watched Google spreadsheet. If so, a Google Meet meeting will be created from this data. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cAyDnMAk8Wh0e48-98m-vvPo18IlEYAjeLajYZ5Y50A/edit?usp=sharing)
